headline: T. Rowe Price Group (NasdaqGS:TROW) Faces Shareholder Proposals On Executive Pay Packages
summary: T. Rowe Price Group (NasdaqGS:TROW) experienced investor activism recently as it received shareholder proposals from activist investor John Chevedden, focusing on shareholder approval for excessive golden parachutes and senior managers' pay packages exceeding certain thresholds. The board advised against these proposals for the upcoming annual meeting. Over the past week, TROW's share price increased by 2% despite a broader market downturn where indices such as the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq...
